doc.title: Bonanza

credit.role: Cowboy in Saloon in Brown Vest
Isabella Marie De La Cuesta/Rosita Morales

doc.plot: The Cartwright's thousand-square-mile Ponderosa Ranch is located near Virginia City, Nevada, site of the Comstock Silver Lode, during and after the Civil War. Each of the sons was born to a different wife of Ben's; none of the mothers is still alive. Adventures are typical western ones, with lots of personal relationships/problems thrown in as well.
